rules_text: Untap target creature or planeswalker and gain control of it until end of turn. Until end of turn, it gains haste and “Remove a counter from this permanent: It deals 1 damage to its owner.”
flavor_text:
[i]“Lucky for you, you're not the first planeswalker I've met. The first two, I hadn't yet figured out that you don't get their sparks after you kill them.”
— Chance-in-Hell, to Manuela Martinez[/i]
